citations.desc: Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors).
citations.narrative:
An adult male Pomeranian named "Chewy" (last digits of m/c 9098) and an adult male Pomeranian named "Alfie" (last
digits of m/c 6373) had dried fecal matter attached to the hair around their anuses. Fecal matter attached to hair can
result in matting, skin irritation, and can even hinder bowel movements. The licensee must remove the fecal matter from
these dogs and must establish an effective program of haircoat maintenance.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee..
n

narrative:
2.40(b)(2)  Repeat
   
Attending veterinarian and adequate veterinary care (dealers and exhibitors). 
An adult male Pomeranian named "Chewy" (last digits of m/c 9098) and an adult male Pomeranian named "Alfie" (last 
digits of m/c 6373) had dried fecal matter attached to the hair around their anuses. Fecal matter attached to hair can 
result in matting, skin irritation, and can even hinder bowel movements. The licensee must remove the fecal matter from 
these dogs and must establish an effective program of haircoat maintenance. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.. 
 
 n
